name: My Famous Card Collection
description:
My Famous Card Collection is a 2D game, mixing the popular game "Cookie Clicker" and a card game to collect. 

Each of the cards are unique and made part of a rarity category.

Your objective is just to collect all cards and be the greatest collector !

Portfolio : https://timotheebourson.wixsite.com/portfolio

Github : https://github.com/17mylan/lootbox
